name: NOBUNAGA’S AMBITION: Ranseiki with Power Up Kit / 信長の野望・嵐世記 with パワーアップキット
description: "NOBUNAGA’S AMBITION: Ranseiki with Power Up Kit" is an expanded version of "NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Ranseiki," which was released in 2001 as the 9th game in the series. Ranseiki is a strategy based simulation game based in Japan's chaotic Warring States period.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (*Japanese Ver. only) Processor: 1GHz over Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 800x600 pixel over DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 22KHz WAVE file can be played
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (*Japanese Ver. only) Processor: 1GHz over Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 800x600 pixel over DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 22KHz WAVE file can be played
